eventName: Ideal City: Carnival in the Endless Summer
storyInfo: Gavial leaps down from the underground waterfall and crashes into Zeruertza, causing a huge misunderstanding. In lieu of repairing the dome, Stitch hopes that Gavial and the others will help him repair the railway bridge to solve the problem of Originium detection.

attributes.content: Thank you, Tomimi. I'll definitely return the favor once we get back to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I-I'm not sure I make a very good lookout, but I'll give it my best shot!
attributes.name: Tomimi
Elysium
attributes.content: Alright, time for a taste!

attributes.name: Elysium
attributes.content: Hmm, currant mead has a rather strange bite to it, but...
attributes.joined: Alright, time for a taste!Hmm, currant mead has a rather strange bite to it, but...

attributes.content: M-Mr. Elysium!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Wh-What's wrong? Are our friends looking for us? You have to tell them I'm not drinking somebody else's liquor––
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: It's Mr. Stitch!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: *huff*... Took me long enough to find you people.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Speaking of which, what's this guy doing here?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Yo, Stitch.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: How many years has it been since we saw each other? How awful of you. I bet you haven't even gone to see my Great Aquapit?
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Talk about timing though! Now that you're here, should we head down there together? The surfing area's amazing!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: I wouldn't mind releasing the flow valve on the water slide while no one's looking, let you experience a true––
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Thanks, but no thanks. I've got business to attend to.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Everyone, with me. If you're done enjoying yourselves here, it's time to get to work.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Stitch, why are you always in such a hurry? We've got all the time in the world, so why don't we––
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: You might have all the time in the world, but I don't. Unlike Design Representative Catch here, full of vim and vigor, I am an Oripathy sufferer with only a few years left.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Oh, sorry, that's not what I meant!
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: What I was trying to say is we ought to sit down and talk things through. Maybe resolve some of our old misunderstandings...
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Listen, Catch.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: If recognition is what you're after, you've already won the hearts of Zeruertza's citizens. My opinion doesn't matter.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: If you're trying to cement your legacy, you might as well build a super water cannon or something, maybe even paint it red or pink. I won't stop you.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Just don't waste your breath on me. I'll never be able to compliment your... heh, 'architecture,' in good faith.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Let's go, surface-dwellers. I'll tell you all about my plans...
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Wait, Stitch, hear me out first––
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Let me offer a word of advice: stay away from me.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: We have our own paths to follow.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Why don't we talk about that Super Water Cannon you just mentioned, when you have a minute. You've got me interested.
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: But, before that... Did any of you just hear something?
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: The merry band of drunkards must be doing something stupid again.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: No, that's not it...
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: Wait, could it be from the dome...?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: There's no way. Have some faith in the quality of my engineering, will you?
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: L-Look at that!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: The feeling of freefall.
Wind rushes loudly past my ears.
Some weirdos at Rhodes Island can't seem to get enough of this sensation. Don't understand them at all.
As for me? There's only one reason I'd ever jump from a height like that: to solve a problem.
Fists, staves, or axes. Anything goes.
You solve a problem by finding the bad guy and beating him down. Nice and simple, right?
No matter what I'm facing––
Even if my axe breaks, my staff splits, and my hands can't make a fist anymore.
All that matters is I got it done.
Doesn't matter to me if there's an evil plot, wild beast, mushroom, natural disaster, or some other nasty thing!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I'll crush it!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hey, Gavial, something doesn't seem quite right. Look down there.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hey, don't make me repeat myself! Unhand me this instant!
attributes.name: Lupo

attributes.content: Oh, sorry about that.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: What the hell's all this? A waterfall? And a slide?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Yahoo!
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Yo, Gavial, what took you so long?
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Welcome to the Durins' Great Aquapit!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: Huh...?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Waaah, Gavial, it's all my fault!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Tomimi!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: So let me get this straight. There's no giant, horrible monster, and no fire or mushrooms raining from the sky?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Elysium called it a 'rhetorical device'...
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: I'm gonna go beat the shit out of him.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Well, what Tomimi said wasn't altogether false. The Durins are having a crisis of some sort.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Though it's not immediately obvious, that is what Mr. Stitch said.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: There's a reason for what I do.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: So, what kind of stunt are you uppity surface folks trying to pull here?!
attributes.name: Lupo

attributes.content: You just broke into Zeruertza brandishing that huge axe, and now you're claiming to be helping the Durins?
attributes.name: Lupo

attributes.content: What a joke. The Durin people are perfectly capable of solving their own problems. As if they'd ever ask for help from you high-and-mighty surface-dwellers.
attributes.name: Lupo

attributes.content: What's more, all that filth and nastiness you carry on you is enough to besmirch our little patch of paradise down here!
attributes.name: Lupo

attributes.content: Uhh, aren't you a Lupo? Aren't you also from the surface?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: I've abandoned everything I was once up above. Now, I am only a citizen of Zeruertza.
attributes.name: Lupo

attributes.content: Therefore, I believe I speak for all the citizens of Zeruertza when I ask you to begone from this city!
attributes.name: Lupo

attributes.content: If you want to be stubborn about it, I don't mind kicking you out by other means.
attributes.name: Lupo

attributes.content: Calm down, Avdotya. I brought them here.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Stitch... I didn't know you were back.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I don't know what you're trying to do, but as someone who used to be 'one of them,' I'd urge you to give it up. Relying on the surface-dwellers will only bring ruin to Zeruertza.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Zeruertzans have never seen real greed, a real scheme.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Avdotya, the people already voted to let them stay...
attributes.name: Catch Lightrace

attributes.content: I have no problem overturning that result with another referendum. It all depends on how the Durins see them.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: But if push comes to shove, and you surface folk bare the weapons of violence and bloodshed as you always do, then I will hunt you to the bitter end.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Gah, you're not making any sense. This whole thing's just a misunderstanding.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I heard Acahualla's underground neighbors needed help, so I came to lend a hand. That's all. Helping them is helping us.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Oh yes, you showed up at your neighbor's house with a chainsaw. I'm sure you're just trying to help me fix my table leg. I'm sorry, could you use that huge axe to help me cut some fruit?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Don't try to pull a fast one on me. I've seen a kindly Messenger transform into the image of wickedness in the blink of an eye. The pursuit of profit and the lust for conquest is in the nature of all surface-dwellers.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: You might be able to deceive my good-natured Durin friends, but you can't trick me. I'm all too familiar with the venom behind your honeyed words.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Uhh, believe it or not, this axe is, uh, just for self-defense.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: But if you think we have to solve this with violence, then I'm more than glad to rumble with you.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hey, you there, with the axe.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: You're badass!
attributes.name: Thrilled Durin

attributes.content: Huh? Oh... Thanks?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Avdotya, you're the best!
attributes.name: Excited Durin

attributes.content: I've only ever seen you scribbling in your notebooks. I never knew you had this side to you!
attributes.name: Excited Durin

attributes.content: What side...?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: How far up did you come from? How'd it feel to jump down?
attributes.name: Thrilled Durin

attributes.content: How come nobody's ever thought of that before? Jumping off the top of the waterfall!
attributes.name: Excited Durin

attributes.content: Are these two your friends? Look at you, keeping secrets from us. You never told us you had such cool friends!
attributes.name: Thrilled Durin

attributes.content: They might be dangerous. We can't...
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Can you ask her to take me up there with her next time?
attributes.name: Excited Durin

attributes.content: Avdotya, did you bring anything back from your last trip? Maybe some more of that fruit from last time?
attributes.name: Thrilled Durin

attributes.content: We haven't seen each other for hours. Let's toast to our reunion!
attributes.name: Excited Durin

attributes.content: Wait, hold on!
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Hey lady, your name is Gavial, right? Can I touch your axe? Is it heavy?
attributes.name: Curious Durin

attributes.content: Uhh, it's not too bad?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You got a minute, Gavial? There's a super-secret to having fun in the Great Aquapit! I'm sure you'll give us the biggest, flashiest splash ever!
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Durin

attributes.content: Here's my address in Zeruertza. If you're not busy, swing by tomorrow for one hell of an ale rager!
attributes.name: Curious Durin

attributes.content: Why wait for tomorrow? Let's start today!
attributes.name: Enthusiastic Durin

attributes.content: I like the sound of that!
attributes.name: Curious Durin

attributes.content: Me too! My good sir Catch, bring us another bottle!
attributes.name: Elysium

attributes.content: What's up with these Durins? Did they get bitten by Elysium or something?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: That's a look, Tomimi. Something on your mind?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Gavial will always be Gavial. No matter where she goes, she captures all the hearts and minds.
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: ...*sigh*.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: The way I see it, it's just a band of dumbasses attracted to the biggest, loudest dumbass.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Some people just have that kind of magnetism.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: So this is 'Gavial the Invincible' that the people of Acahualla keep talking about.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: What's she jumping off the waterfall for? Did you plan this?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: No... but I suppose trouble comes in threes.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Tomimi, I'm surrounded! Gimme a hand!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Coming!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: It's too rowdy here. Let's move somewhere else.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: So you're the Durin.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: While I was in Acahualla, your name was on everyone's lips, Gavial.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Then tell me, what exactly is this crisis that Zeruertza faces, and how will it affect Acahualla?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: That... To be honest, is an extremely complicated question, involving multiple layers including geography, geology, sociology, and more.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Let's start peeling back those layers.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: The most difficult part is, we can't discuss this topic without delving a little bit into literature first...
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Like Tomimi, I also borrowed a few 'rhetorical' tricks.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: In other words, what you told us was an exaggeration?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: I wouldn't call it an exaggeration. I just, uh, was looking at things from a more macro-historical level.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: As Terra's crust changes over millions of years, there is indeed a high probability that the entire rainforest will sink into the ground...
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Can I beat the snot out of this little runt?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: By all means.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Wait, wait, hold on! I truly do need your help though, and this matter is critically important to Zeruertza!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Let's look at this from a business standpoint! Surely you've seen it too — Durin technology will definitely come in handy in the rainforest!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: The Acahuallans won't have to treasure a few discarded lathes!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Hmm, if you're telling the truth.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: I assure you, I'll answer any technical questions the people of Acahualla might have!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: (*mutters*) Heh, assuming you can even understand my answers.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: What was that?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I-I said, even if you don't understand at first, I'll try to explain things as best as I can.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Let's cut to the chase then. What exactly are you trying to do?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: It's very simple. Help me convince the others to repair the railway bridge connecting the city. It was damaged in the last earthquake.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: That way, Zeruertza can relocate its Originium detection devices without tossing out this entire damned dome, and I can be free of the old man's constant nagging.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: By the way, feel free to blow up a certain oversized slide blocking the railway bridge. That'd be killing two fowlbeasts with one stone. No, three!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Mr. Stitch, why do you have to build an entire railway instead of just repairing the dome? It'd be a shame to blow up the slide!
attributes.name: Tomimi

attributes.content: Everyone voted to leave the hole there and build the Great Aquapit.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Moreover, repairing the dome poses a series of esoteric technical problems which won't make sense to the likes of you!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: As such, we have to hold a new referendum to get our plan approved!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: I'd rather not. I like the slide myself, and it would be a damned shame to blow it up.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Given how handy you Durins are, why do you need us Acahuallans to help you fix the bridge?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Fine... there's no harm in telling you.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: As the designer who proposed the plan to rebuild the railway bridge, I will naturally be put in charge if the proposal passes.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: However! Have you seen the blueprint for the railway bridge? I saw it back when I was in school, and it couldn't deviate any more from my ultra-minimalist design philosophy!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: That dense wiring! That ugly skeleton frame!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: So, I slept through every single one of my railway bridge design classes.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: So... you have no idea how to build a railway bridge at all?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Though I hate to admit it, it is my one shortcoming.
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: That is why I am enlisting the aid of all skilled Acahuallans, subcontracting this important project to you!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: So how about it? A flawless solution, wouldn't you say?
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Durin society must be incredibly tolerant to allow a little shit like him to live this long...
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: H-Hey! What do you mean by that?!
attributes.name: Stitch Canvas

attributes.content: Alright, since Zumama is here, she can probably fix up the bridge in no time.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Huh? Where'd she go?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: I knew it. It wasn't just my imagination.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: ...WARNING.
attributes.name: Strange Machine

attributes.content: Get over here, little fella!
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Bogey. Danger! Initiating evasive maneuvers!
attributes.name: Strange Machine

attributes.content: Hey, stay put!
attributes.name: Eunectes
